mapper.select:
SELECT info.*, category.`code` as category_code FROM t_product_info info LEFT JOIN t_product_category category ON info.product_type = category.id
ORDER BY info.create_time desc limit #{start},#{size}
SELECT count(1) FROM t_product_info info LEFT JOIN t_product_category category ON info.product_type = category.id

SELECT info.id, substring_index(info.image, ',', 1) as view_image, info.`name`, info.description, info.sales_volume, price.price, price.virtual_price FROM t_product_info info LEFT JOIN t_product_price price ON info.id = price.product_id
limit #{start},#{size}
SELECT count(1) FROM t_product_info info LEFT JOIN t_product_price price ON info.id = price.product_id

SELECT info.id, substring_index(info.image, ',', 1) as view_image, info.`name`, info.description, info.sales_volume, price.price, price.virtual_price FROM t_ads_product ads LEFT JOIN t_product_info info on ads.product_id = info.id LEFT JOIN t_product_price price ON ads.product_id = price.product_id
ORDER BY info.sales_volume desc limit #{start},#{size}
SELECT count(1) FROM t_ads_product ads LEFT JOIN t_product_info info on ads.product_id = info.id LEFT JOIN t_product_price price ON ads.product_id = price.product_id

SELECT info.id, info.image, info.detail_images, info.name, info.description, info.service, info.sales_volume, info.freight_amount, info.key_point, info.refund_validity, price.price, price.virtual_price, price.stock FROM t_product_info info LEFT JOIN t_product_price price ON info.id = price.product_id and price.default_flag = '0' where price.product_id = #{productId}
